Publication Title: Establishing a Physiologic Human Vascularized Micro-Tumor Model for Cancer Research
Publication Authors: Stephanie J Hachey, Daniela Gaebler, Christopher C W Hughes
Publication Abstract: A lack of validated cancer models that recapitulate the tumor microenvironment of solid cancers in vitro remains a significant bottleneck for preclinical cancer research and therapeutic development.¬†To overcome this problem, we have developed the vascularized microtumor (VMT), or tumor chip, a microphysiological system that realistically models the complex human tumor microenvironment.
